body.name: Mothca Matte Glass Screen Protector for iPhone SE 2020/2022 Anti-Glare & Anti-Fingerprint 9H HD Clear Tempered Glass Film for iPhone SE 2nd/3rd Generation Smooth as Silk
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 57 mins
features: 【HD Clear】Screen Protector Compatible with iPhone SE 2020/2022, Tempered Glass with 9H screen hardness, Mothca matte screen protector is matte finish but also HD clear. While some poor quality matte glass has poor clarity and transparency, we promise you never need to worry about the same problem for Mothca Matte Glass.

【Smooth as Silk】The perfect matte surface has the silk-like touch feeling, magically resists dirt, sweat and annoying fingerprints, very little frictional resistance even for hand sweating. Easy to flick operation, "Comfortable Game Operation". 100% touch accurate and 3D-touch sensing.
【Anti-Glare】The matte finish tempered glass using the same technology as E-reader matte screen, no screen glare, even in bright sunlight, no dazzling, easy reading outdoor or under light.

【Go Further Than 2.5D Round Edge】A special polishing is crafted to edge of the glass to give a more smooth touch feeling, go further than 2.5D round edge, not easy to be broken and extremely durable 9H hardness, protect your iPhone SE 2020/2022 screen from scratches, daily wear and drops.
【What is Included】1 piece Mothca matte screen protector for iPhone SE 2020/2022 , cleaning set, dust remover.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mothca Matte Screen Protector for iPhone SE 2020/2022 CASE FRIENDLY: Mothca iPhone SE 2020/2022 Matte screen protector will allow you to use almost all kinds of case. DAILY PROTECTION: Designed with a hydrophobic and oleophobic coating and an anti-scratch surface to protect your screen from accidental spills, oil residue from fingerprints, bumps and daily wear-and-tear. Package included: 1 x Matte Tempered Glass Screen Protector for iPhone SE 2020/20221 x Cleaning Set1 x Alignment Sticker1 x Retail Packaging

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to install
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased similar products in the past and I must say this one is quite impressive. Strong, easy to install and has a nice anti reflective matte finish which I just love. The instructions are very precise and easy to follow, the kit comes with wipes, a dust remover and alignment stickers, even the box is very nice, I'm keeping it since it's so nice looking, anyways, buy it, it's a safe buy since the vendor offers full refund if for some reason the protector broke on the way or if you are not totally satisfied with your purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had this screen protector for over a year now, and it works perfectly as intended! It completely reduces glare, and doesn’t impact the performance of the phone screen at all. It fir perfectly as well! I actually recently shattered it (I accidentally hit my phone screen with the handle of my knife…), and it completely protected my screen! I just ordered a new one. The only “issue” I had was that upon shattering, it didn’t hold together super well, so I had to take a lot of care in removing it, but unless you break it into small pieces you won’t likely have that issue. Couldn’t recommend this more! It’s an absolute steal for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put on and clear and responsive. I keep a new one so when I abuse the current one I’ll be ready with a new one. Very sturdy but construction and tool can be rough on them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A bit challenging to put on, but it works
reviews.reviewText: It was a bit hard to get this on the phone. I had trouble smoothing air (?) bubbles off the surface. Once on, though, it does its job. It reduces glare and keeps the screen safer from damage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Truly great product
reviews.reviewText: These folks got it right. Easy to install, no bubbles, no trial and error before getting it centered. Comes with a moist cloth and a dry one. On top of that, it comes with several adhesive slips to remove specks of dust off the screen before installing.On the phone, it does not interfere with the case. Very smooth surface. Very little sparkle too.The only thing is a very slight bezel that makes the screen look parted on the very edge when looking at it at an angle. 90-degree viewing is perfect.Overall, very good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Rainbow edge and cracked
reviews.reviewText: Edge of the screen showed a rainbow from day one. Then within a month the screen cracked/scratched somehow. Wasn’t dropped just took it out of my pocket one morning to a crack. Would buy literally any screen but this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Protects screen, reduces glare... but has some setbacks worth considering
reviews.reviewText: Fully acknowledge that this could be the result of not applying the cover correctly - however, you can see from the photos, it appears that the screen protector isn't wide enough to be flush against both ends of the display screen. Again, that could be my own fault. My biggest complaint is that screen protector seems to be significantly less sensitive compared to non-matte ones. I find myself having to double tap or apply more pressure than normal sometimes. The matte screen itself works well in terms of blocking glare/leaving no fingerprints and protecting the screen itself, but the image quality seems slightly distorted compared to non-matte screens protectors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I really like this screen protector
reviews.reviewText: Really like the matte look on my phone. I really prefer this brand. For whatever reason, I have to replace my iPhone screen protectors often and I’ve never had any problems with this brand until the last time I ordered one. It cracked during the application so I contacted Amazon and they were so prompt to replace this item that I had it on my porch for the next morning literally shocked me and it’s very much appreciated that they would replace it so quickly and like I said before, I don’t know why iPhone screen protectors have to be replaced so often. Definitely a con of owning an iPhone in my opinion. When I had android phones, I never had to replace a screen protector! For whatever reason, they seemed to be more sturdy but I like dealing with a company such as Mothca that stand behind their products and replaces it no matter what
Good nonglare. When I write hard to install, I mean without bubbles or bits of lint on the screen. One of the corners is cracking off, seems brittle.Also the cover fogs up the reverse camera lense.

reviews.reviewTitle: Goed product niet zo eenvoudig aan te brengen
reviews.reviewText: Product is top! Had ik al veel eerder moeten doen. Reactiesnelheid is nog altijd even goed met dit glas. Systeem om aan te brengen was niet handig, ik heb geluk dat het goed is gegaan maar kan me voorstellen dat er vele personen het glas er ondanks veel moeite schuin zullen opzetten.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Little expensive for what it is but a very well made layer of protection and exactly what I was expecting 👌

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on May 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: After using so many screen protectors with all air gaps and breaking corners, I was skeptical but wanted to try a matt one again. Especially because of the sunny days coming up.. and guess what? I’ve got the first and only first ever easy application of such thing without air gap 👍🏽 Amazed by the quality and the fact that the pack came together with even “dust removal sticker” and alignment stickers so you don’t need to touch it or spoil it before applying like always happens to me. Really happy!
